fullText:
Learn by Doing

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, warlord
Benefit: When you use a warlord power to grant an ally a basic attack and that attack misses a creature, the ally gains a +2 bonus to his or her next attack roll against that creature before the end of his or her next turn.

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 144.
name: Learn by Doing
